onBoardingDescription0: Conveniently buy goods or services over the internet, selecting items, providing shipping details, and securely paying electronically before receiving your order.
onBoardingDescription1: You're provided with tracking information to monitor the delivery progress of your order until it reaches your doorstepUpon completing an online purchase
onBoardingDescription2: Payment method where goods or services are received first, with payment settled upon delivery or receipt, often used to build trust in online transactions.

terms_conditions_desc_1:
We ask you to read the general conditions with particular attention because the use of vitapharma implies their full and unreserved acceptance.
vitapharma is content hosted on the Internet and operated by the company AIH Group, a public limited company under Moroccan law, registered in the Casablanca ICE commercial register: 000 151 150 000 031 and whose head office is located in Casablanca.

These general conditions of sale of products/services constitute contractual clauses applicable to any purchase by any user on the website.
The terms “you” and “user” mean the end user accessing the Website. The terms “service providers” mean third party service providers. The terms around the personal pronoun “we” refer to AIH Group, its franchisors, its affiliates and its partners. The term “site” refers to vitapharma
terms_conditions_desc_2:
The use of vitapharma is subject to full and unreserved acceptance of all the conditions below and all conditions displayed on the website.
Any use of the Services by the user automatically entails the application of these T&Cs.

vitapharma reserves the right to delete a user, considering that they have not complied with the T&Cs, without notifying them.
terms_conditions_desc_3: These conditions apply both in the singular and in the plural. Whenever the context may require it, any pronoun must include the corresponding masculine and feminine. The terms “in particular”, “includes” and “including” are deemed to be followed by the expression “without limitation”. Unless the context otherwise requires, the terms "herein", "herein", "herein", "hereinafter" and terms of similar meaning refer to the Conditions as a whole.
terms_conditions_desc_4: If any provision of the Terms is found to be invalid or unenforceable in whole or in part, such invalidity or unenforceability shall attach only to that provision or part of a provision. All other provisions of these Terms remain valid.
terms_conditions_desc_6: Users are solely responsible for all content uploaded to the Website. vitapharma does not verify, endorse or guarantee user content or generally any content posted on the Internet website. Users may be held legally responsible for their content, in particular, when it is defamatory or protected by copyright etc. If you encounter abuse or witness a violation of the Terms, please report it to Customer Service.
terms_conditions_desc_7:
You certify that you are the owner of the content you submit to us and that the content does not infringe any intellectual property rights or other rights.
You also certify that, to the best of your knowledge, no action, suit, proceeding, or investigation has been initiated or threatened against you in relation to the content you submit, in particular when it concerns a trademark or 'a trade name. You undertake to provide accurate information regarding personal contact details as well as any other information necessary for access to the Website Services and to regularly update this information if necessary, this information being protected in accordance with applicable regulations.
terms_conditions_desc_8: vitapharma does not guarantee that the appearance of the final product ordered by the user will exactly conform to their expectations. In particular, changes to certain aspects of your order such as the size or color of items may be necessary. vitapharma warns you of possible modifications that you can refuse. In this case, you will return the product if you received it and you will be refunded.
terms_conditions_desc_9:
1. Unless otherwise indicated, vitapharma owns, without limitation, all intellectual property rights in the content of the website, such as source code, databases, texts, images etc. You acknowledge and agree that you must not use, reproduce or distribute any content from the Website belonging to vitapharma without obtaining authorization from vitapharma.
2. You are solely responsible for any content you provide to or download from the Website.
terms_conditions_desc_10: The Website may contain links to other sites. The linked sites are not under the control of vitapharma. vitapharma is not responsible for the content of linked sites, in particular any changes or updates to the linked site. vitapharma is not responsible for any form of solicitation of the linked site. vitapharma provides these links as a convenience only, and the inclusion of any link does not imply endorsement by vitapharma.
terms_conditions_desc_11:
1. vitapharma may suspend or terminate your account or any element if it considers that you have not complied with any of these conditions.
2. If you or vitapharma terminates your account, vitapharma may delete any content or material relating to your use of vitapharma.
terms_conditions_desc_12:
The prices of the products are displayed on pa, in the Moroccan monetary unit. vitapharma reserves the right to modify prices, products and services without notifying the user.
1. Discounts will be applied on the total value of the goods, including VAT. The issue or redemption of a voucher or coupon applies to the total value of the order once all promotional discounts have been applied.
2. Only one voucher or coupon can be used per order unless otherwise stated.
3. vitapharma may offer competitions at different and limited periods. The conditions of these competitions will be available to the user on the site.
terms_conditions_desc_14:
We may collect information of various kinds. We need this information, in particular to enable the ordering of a product, payment and delivery.
We collect, store and process your data to enable the proper use of the website. We may collect information on the registration form such as your name, gender, email address, postal address, delivery address (if different), telephone number, mobile phone number, payment details, credit card or contact details banking.
terms_conditions_desc_15:
We store and process your information on servers protected by technological and human security devices. We ask third parties to verify and certify our privacy principles.
We may pass your contact details to a third party in order to carry out delivery of the order. We may also use your data to detect possible abuse or fraud, send you information about the website or our products.
We may use your personal information for reviews and market research. Your data is anonymous and will only be used for statistical purposes.
We will not share any of your personal information with third parties without your explicit consent. Likewise, we do not sell or rent your personal information to third parties for marketing purposes without your explicit consent.
If you prefer not to receive any of the additional information detailed in this paragraph (or any part of it) please click the "unsubscribe" link in any Email we send you
terms_conditions_desc_16: We have implemented appropriate technical security measures to prevent unauthorized or illegal access to your information. When we collect data through the Website, we collect your personal data on a secure server. We use firewalls on our servers. When we collect electronic payment card information, we use encryption using Secure Socket Layer (SSL) encoding technology. It is strongly recommended that you do not send any credit or debit card details in unencrypted electronic communications with us. But you are responsible for protecting against unauthorized access to your password and your computer.
terms_conditions_desc_17: Acceptance of cookies is not necessary to visit the website. However, we would like to point out that to ensure the correct use of the website cookies are necessary. Cookies are text files that are used to identify your computer when you visit certain pages on the Website and are stored by your Internet browser on your computer's hard drive. Cookies can be used to recognize your Internet Protocol address, saving you time when you return to the website. Your browser may be configured not to accept cookies, but this may restrict your use of vitapharma
faq_question1: What payment methods are accepted, especially for Cash on Delivery (COD)?
faq_question2: Is it safe to choose Cash on Delivery as a payment method?
faq_question3: How do I pay using Cash on Delivery?
faq_question4: Can I use Cash on Delivery for international orders?
faq_question5: Are there any additional fees for choosing Cash on Delivery?
faq_question6: What if I'm not available to pay in cash during the delivery?
faq_question7: Can I change my payment method after placing the order?
faq_question8: Is Cash on Delivery available for all products?
faq_question9: How do I create an account?
faq_question10: How can I track my order?
faq_question13: Are there any ongoing promotions or discounts?
faq_question14: How do I reset my password?
faq_question15: Can I change or cancel my order after it has been placed?
faq_question16: What are the shipping costs and delivery times?
faq_answer1: We accept Cash on Delivery (COD) for eligible orders. Simply select this option during the checkout process. Please ensure you have the exact amount ready for the delivery.
faq_answer2: Yes, Cash on Delivery is a secure payment option. You only pay when you receive your order. We recommend having the exact amount ready to expedite the delivery process.
faq_answer3: When your order is delivered, you can pay the delivery person in cash. Please prepare the exact amount mentioned in your order confirmation to ensure a smooth transaction.
faq_answer4: Currently, Cash on Delivery is available for domestic orders only. For international orders, please choose from the other available payment methods during checkout.
faq_answer5: There might be a nominal COD fee associated with choosing Cash on Delivery. Please review the details during the checkout process.
faq_answer6: If you're unavailable during the delivery, please arrange for someone to accept the order on your behalf and provide the exact cash amount. Our delivery personnel will not be able to leave the package without receiving payment.
faq_answer7: Unfortunately, once the order is placed, you cannot change the payment method. If you have concerns, please contact our customer support to explore possible solution
faq_answer8: Cash on Delivery may not be available for certain products or locations. Please check the product page or contact our customer support for more information.
faq_answer9: To create an account, click on the "Sign Up" or "Create Account" link on the top right corner of the homepage. Fill in the required information, such as your email address and password, and follow the prompts to complete the registration.
faq_answer10: You can track your order by logging into your account and navigating to the "Order History" section. There, you will find a tracking number and a link to the shipping carrier's website for real-time updates on your package's location.
faq_answer11: Our return policy allows you to return items within [X] days of receiving your order. Please visit our "Returns and Exchanges" page for detailed instructions and eligibility criteria.
faq_answer12: Yes, we offer international shipping. During the checkout process, select your country, and shipping options and costs will be provided.
faq_answer13: To stay updated on our promotions and discounts, subscribe to our newsletter or check the "Promotions" section on our website. We also run seasonal sales, so keep an eye out for those!
faq_answer14: If you've forgotten your password, click on the "Forgot Password" link on the login page. Follow the instructions sent to your email to reset your password.
faq_answer15: Orders are processed quickly to ensure prompt delivery. Please contact our customer support as soon as possible to check if changes or cancellations can be accommodated.
faq_answer16: Shipping costs and delivery times vary based on your location and the shipping method selected. You can review this information during the checkout process before completing your purchase.
about_us_desc1: Welcome to [Your Company Name], where your online shopping experience meets unparalleled quality and style. We are more than just an e-commerce platform; we are a passionate team dedicated to delivering exceptional products and service to our valued customers.
about_us_desc2: Founded in [Year], [Your Company Name] emerged from a shared vision of redefining online shopping. Tired of the ordinary, we set out to create a destination that goes beyond transactions and transforms every purchase into a delightful experience.
about_us_desc3: At [Your Company Name], our mission is simple — to curate a collection that reflects your unique lifestyle. We strive to offer a diverse range of high-quality products that blend innovation, style, and functionality. Whether you're searching for fashion, electronics, or home essentials, we've got you covered.
about_us_desc4:
Quality Assurance: We handpick each product, ensuring it meets our stringent quality standards. Your satisfaction is our top priority.

Customer-Centric Approach: We believe in building lasting relationships with our customers. Our dedicated customer support team is always ready to assist you, from product inquiries to after-sales support.

Innovation in Every Detail: From our website design to the products we offer, innovation is at the heart of everything we do. We stay ahead of trends, so you can too.

Secure and Seamless Shopping: Your online security is crucial to us. Shop with confidence, knowing that your personal information is safeguarded by the latest encryption technologies.
about_us_desc5: [Your Company Name] is committed to making a positive impact on the environment. We actively seek eco-friendly products, minimize packaging waste, and partner with like-minded suppliers who share our commitment to sustainability.
about_us_desc6: Whether you're a trendsetter, a tech enthusiast, or someone seeking the perfect home decor, we invite you to join the [Your Company Name] community. Discover a world of possibilities, and let us redefine the way you shop online.
